committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To allow service performed as an employee of a nonappropriated fund instrumentality after 1965 and before 1987 to be considered creditable for purposes of civil service retirement.

summary.text: Prescribes guidelines under which service performed by certain Federal employees of non-appropriated fund instrumentalities after December 31, 1965, and before January 1, 1987, shall be considered creditable service for purposes of civil service retirement benefits.

titles.title: To allow service performed as an employee of a nonappropriated fund instrumentality after 1965 and before 1987 to be considered creditable for purposes of civil service retirement.
